author: desruisseaux
msg: Modify the way we handle the "West orientated" case, keeping in mind that the "kernel" part of SIS projections used normalized (easting,northing) directions.
The reversal of the 'x' axis from "easting" to "westing" is done outside the projection package, by the CoordinateSystems.swapAndScaleAxes(...) method.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Add a note about the fact that we currently do not serialize the factories.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Fix the code that generate the HTML page that list available projection methods.
We need to ignore the "mock" methods created only for testing purpose, and to handle the "Affine" case in a special way.
